price: Ɛna Wabͻ nyεmmoa nso ama mo; wͻn ho no monya (ntaadeε a) εma mo ͻhyew, san (nya) mfasoͻ pii firi wͻn ho; na wͻn mu bi nso mowe (wͻn nnam).
arabic: وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ خَلَقَهَاۖ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا دِفۡءٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wal-anʿāma khalaqahā lakum fīhā dif'on wamanāfiʿu wamin'hā takulūna
